entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
